content:
The flower tea has a special fragrance,
I wonder if it's because
these flowers grew along our Astralink?

The flower tea at this tea party is too precious to waste.
I'll head back to my tent to rest after I finish it.

Oh, they prepared a camping bed!
How thoughtful!
Now we should have all the essentials for living here.

Ever since coming here,
time seems to move slower... though maybe I'm just imagining things...
Don't mind me, I'm just letting my thoughts wander.
